timeline.message: Fix yaml parsing exception for GovernanceBootstrapInitializerTest (#7285)
Fix conflicts due to ConfigCenterNode refactor for GovernanceBootstrapInitializerTest (#7285)
Fix conflicts due to YamlDataSourceConfigurationWrap for GovernanceBootstrapInitializerTest (#7285)

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe we can remove this class because of we just load file by basic IO lib.
Please do not process the comment like #, snake yaml can handle it.
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText:
It is unnecessary to assert private field, and unnecessary to assert transaction contexts.
So maybe we can remove this class for reflection.
timeline.author: terrymanu
